features.title: Drive business and customer growth with in-store digital advertising

list.title: Create an immersive and engaging shopping experience at the point of sale
list.blurb: Turn your store into an immersive experience with dynamic, personalized content that boosts ad recall, influences purchases, and strengthens customer connections.

list.title: Influence shopper behaviour with timely messages that drive add-to-cart moments
list.blurb: Leverage real-time data to deliver timely, targeted ads that drive impulse buys and add-to-cart decisions, maximizing conversions and sales.

list.title: Monetize your store’s screens with endemic and non-endemic ads
list.blurb: Transform your digital displays into a revenue engine by selling ad space to brand partners while maintaining control over content that drives engagement and sales.

platform.title: With intelligent automation, content scheduling, ad delivery, and campaign management, our platform can do the heavy lifting

boxes.title: Automate your content delivery with the right campaign at the right time
boxes.par: Automate scheduling and ad delivery to effortlessly distribute content across your store network—nationwide, regional, or at the store level—so you can maximize impact with campaigns that drive measurable results.

boxes.title: Drive Sales with Local Store Engagement
boxes.par: Empower your stores to connect with their communities through localized digital content that increases foot traffic and boosts sales. Highlight regional products, celebrate local farmers, and deliver a tailored in-store experience—all while maintaining full brand control and content consistency across locations.

boxes.title: Endless ad opportunities that drive additional revenue
boxes.par: Our open API ecosystem seamlessly integrates with e-commerce, point-of-sale, and inventory systems to deliver real-time, data-driven content that enhances the shopper's journey.

boxes.title: Programmatic advertising, your way
boxes.par: Monetize your screens with programmatic ads while maintaining full control over content, ensuring a seamless in-store experience. Tailor deals to your needs and retain complete control, offering flexibility to support your incremental revenue strategy and maximize returns.
